description: Christy Turlington is sublime in her take on the twin set; see how we shop the look in our slide show.
title: Look of the Moment | Christy Turlington
title_page: Look of the Moment | Christy Turlington
text:
The Look: Sublime twin set — what’s easier than a featherweight cardigan and clean V-neck sweater over cropped black pants?
The Girl: The supermodel Christy Turlington relaxes Saturday night at the United Way and Vanity Fair event in Sagaponack, N.Y.
The Details: Catherine Malandrino cardigan and trousers, Prada shell, Céline sandals and Marni bracelet.
Archives: Look of the Moment >>
